channel.title: How to make scar click a color and not a coor?
channel.description: How do i make SCAR click a color and not a coor so i can right click > attack instead of just plain left clicking for more randomness ?

item.title: How to make scar click a color and not a coor?
item.dc:creator: @_hai - hai -
item.description:
@_hai wrote:

[quote=“roberty bob, post:9, topic:5199”]I’ll try to make you even happier.
Now it combines left and also rightclicks 3/10 times on average.

If(findcolorspiral(x, y, color, 1, 1, 512, 336))then
begin
  if ((random(10)+1)>7) then
  begin
  Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False); //Right Click.
  ChooseOption(x, y, 'Attack');
  end
  else
  Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True); //Left Click.
end;

Odie’s old autofighter has that rightclick functionalilty… it cuts down a lot on misclicks. and I leveled a character to level 80 with it, so apprently it doesn’t attract the bannage stick either.[/quote]

Omg , Thanks alot man ;):)

Read full topic
item.source: How to make scar click a color and not a coor?

item.title: How to make scar click a color and not a coor?
item.dc:creator: @roberty_bob roberty bob
item.description:
@roberty_bob wrote:

I’ll try to make you even happier.
Now it combines left and also rightclicks 3/10 times on average.

If(findcolorspiral(x, y, color, 1, 1, 512, 336))then
begin
  if ((random(10)+1)>7) then
  begin
  Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False); //Right Click.
  ChooseOption(x, y, 'Attack');
  end
  else
  Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True); //Left Click.
end;

Odie’s old autofighter has that rightclick functionalilty… it cuts down a lot on misclicks. and I leveled a character to level 80 with it, so apprently it doesn’t attract the bannage stick either.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make scar click a color and not a coor?
item.dc:creator: @_hai - hai -
item.description:
@_hai wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:6, topic:5199”]Don’t you mean like this:

If(findcolorspiral(x, y, color, 1, 1, 512, 336))then begin Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False); //Right Click. ChooseOption(x, y, 'Attack'); end;
? That would right click on something with that color, then choose the option attack.[/quote]

Thanks cheesehunk you’ve made me even happier loool , i’m in a kinda hyper mood … meh

Thanks again both of you weeeewwwwttt

Read full topic
